title: Apple’s New CO2 Neutral Products Are Cool, But Don’t Let Them Distract You From the Big Picture
summary: Apple announced its first-ever carbon-neutral products, the Apple Watch Series 9, Apple Watch Ultra 2, and Apple Watch SE. The company achieved this by reducing emissions from materials and transportation in production and by using recycled materials in its new bands and phone cases. Apple is also working on developing AI tools, but it is important to monitor the company's progress towards its goal of carbon neutrality by 2030.
green_innovation: TRUE. The product innovation is considered a green innovation because it reduces negative environmental externalities of human activity by using recycled materials and reducing emissions during production.
business_innovation: TRUE. The product innovation is considered a business innovation because it introduces new or improved goods or services that differ significantly from the firm's previous offerings.
green_product: TRUE. The product innovation is considered a green product because it is designed, manufactured, and used in a way that significantly reduces its environmental impact throughout its life cycle by using recycled materials and reducing emissions during production.
green_process: FALSE. The article does not describe a process innovation.
product_or_process: Apple Watch Series 9, Apple Watch Ultra 2, and Apple Watch SE
likely_naics_codes: ['334413 - Semiconductor and Related Device Manufacturing', '423430 - Computer and Computer Peripheral Equipment and Software Wholesaling', '511210 - Software Publishers', '561920 - Cellular and Other Wireless Telecommunications']
greenwashing: FALSE. The described product innovations are not examples of greenwashing because the environmental benefits are substantiated and not exaggerated.

title: Ceramics leader drives a carbon-neutral and digitalised future
summary: NGK Insulators (NGK) is a ceramics technology company that is transitioning to a decarbonized and digitalized future. The company is reducing its own emissions, pivoting towards producing smart, fossil-fuel-free solutions, and supplying vital ceramics products for electronic devices. NGK aims for half of its sales by 2030 to come from products related to carbon neutrality and digital society.
green_innovation: TRUE, NGK is developing and producing smart, fossil-fuel-free solutions, such as a grid-scale battery for renewable energy storage and subnano-ceramic membranes to capture carbon dioxide at a molecular level.
business_innovation: TRUE, NGK is developing and producing new products and processes, such as subnano-ceramic membranes to capture carbon dioxide at a molecular level and ultra-thin EnerCera batteries to enable maintenance-free IoT devices.
green_product: TRUE, NGK is developing and producing smart, fossil-fuel-free solutions, such as a grid-scale battery for renewable energy storage and subnano-ceramic membranes to capture carbon dioxide at a molecular level.
green_process: TRUE, NGK is implementing processes to reduce its own emissions, such as switching to using renewable energy in all its European factories and aiming to achieve the same for all factories outside Japan by 2025.
likely_naics_codes: ['327993: Ceramic Products Manufacturing', '541712: Research and Development in the Physical, Engineering, and Life Sciences', '335999: All Other Miscellaneous Electrical Equipment and Component Manufacturing', '334419: Other Electronic Component Manufacturing']
greenwashing: FALSE, NGK is genuinely reducing its own emissions and pivoting towards producing smart, fossil-fuel-free solutions.

title: Conti's Etzel: 'North America is strategic growth market'
summary: Continental Tire opened a new headquarters building as part of its commitment to sustainability, the building was constructed with green building practices and will offer LEED gold certification. The company has also invested in a Retread Solutions Development Center to improve its retread process and offer training to its partners. Despite challenges like the increasing non-USTMA imports within the replacement market, the company has observed sustained market interest in Tier 1 specialty tire products.
product_or_process: New headquarters building and Retread Solutions Development Center
likely_naics_codes: ['326211 - Tire Manufacturing', '332999 - All Other Fabricated Metal Product Manufacturing', '561910 - Retreading and Tire Repair Shops', '541330 - Engineering Services']

title: Official Marketing Partners
summary: GolfForever is a comprehensive, smart at-home training system that takes a science-based approach to maximizing golfers’ performance by improving flexibility, core strength, balance and rotational power.  With golf-specific routines designed by some of the top PGA TOUR trainers and orthopedic experts in the U.S. for any golfer, regardless of their age or physical capabilities, GolfForever users can expect to swing and perform their best – with a pain-free body – for as long as they play the game.  It is used daily by more than 400 PGA TOUR and LPGA Tour players, including Scottie Scheffler, Tom Kim, Zach Johnson, Justin Leonard and Ryan Palmer, and thousands of everyday golfers alike.
likely_naics_codes: ['339999 - All Other Miscellaneous Manufacturing', '339112 - Surgical and Medical Instrument Manufacturing', '339113 - Surgical Appliance and Supplies Manufacturing', '813110 - Sports and Recreation Instruction']

title: Tim Cook
summary: Tim Cook, the CEO of Apple, is a strong advocate for environmental sustainability. Under his leadership, Apple has made significant investments in green innovation, business innovation, and green products. Apple's commitment to sustainability is evident in its products, processes, and operations.
green_innovation: TRUE. Apple has made significant investments in green innovation, such as developing new materials and processes that reduce environmental impact.
business_innovation: TRUE. Apple's introduction of new products and processes, such as the iPhone and iPad, have revolutionized the way we communicate and consume information.
green_product: TRUE. Apple's products are designed to be energy-efficient and environmentally friendly. For example, the iPhone 12 is made from recycled aluminum and glass.
green_process: TRUE. Apple's processes are designed to minimize environmental impact. For example, the company uses renewable energy to power its data centers.

title: Optimizing Analytical Tools To Accelerate Translational Research
summary: Thermo Fisher Scientific has launched new mass spectrometry (MS) and chromatography instruments to support scientists with deeper analytical insights and productivity improvements, enabling translational omics research. The focus on optimizing instruments for specific applications, such as biopharma and structural biology, aims to accelerate research by providing tailored solutions. To increase the exposure of MS and proteomics in precision medicine, Thermo Fisher is working on connecting proteomics and genomics data.
product_or_process: new mass spectrometry (MS) and chromatography instruments, software solutions, the Thermo Scientific™ OrbitrapTM AscendTM Editions, Thermo Scientific™ OrbitrapTM AstralTM mass spectrometer (MS), Thermo Scientific™ StellarTM MS, Tandem Direct Injection workflow, Thermo Scientific Vanquish™ Neo ultra-high performance liquid chromatography (UHPLC) system
